price: "Sa'an nan kuma wata shẽkara ta zo daga bãyan wancan, a cikinta ake yi wa mutãne ruwa mai albarka, kuma a cikinta suke mãtsar abin sha."
arabic: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika ʿāmun fīhi yughāthu al-nāsu wafīhi yaʿṣirūna
